m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen fuel cell-powered Audi A7 hits the road this August | Digital Trends
m_szDocSumamry: inbox for free! Audi is covering all of the bases when it comes to alternative fuels. In addition to the A3 e-tron plug-in hybrid and A3 g-tron natural gas production cars, not to mention the stillborn R8 e-tron electric supercar , The Ingolstadt gang is reportedly working on a hydrogen-powered version of the A7 as well. According to Autocar , the prototype A7 will be powered by hydrogen fuel cells, as opposed to using straight hydrogen to power an internal combustion engine as Aston Martin did with its recent Hybrid Hydrogen Rapide S.
